alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 10:53PM CDT until October 15 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN CLEVELAND COUNTIES... At 1052 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Jones to near Choctaw to near Moore, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, northern Norman, southeastern Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Newalla, northern Lake Thunderbird, Forest Park, Lake Aluma and Smith Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
